item.title: 欧洲银行警告环境、社会和公司治理的突然撤退隐藏着信用风险
item.description: 欧洲银行业联合会警告说，拟议中的集团环境、社会和公司治理（ESG）规则的倒退规模之大，将使贷款人更难分析信贷风险。【原文：The European Banking Federation is warning that the sheer scale of a proposed rollback of the bloc’s ESG rules will make it harder for lenders to analyze credit risk.】

item.title: 香港将降低低端住宅交易的物业税
item.description: 香港政府将降低部分廉价住宅的印花税，这是香港政府为提振低迷的房地产市场所做的最新尝试。【原文：The Hong Kong government will lower the stamp duty for some cheap homes in its latest attempt to boost the lackluster property market.】

item.title: 中国前疾控中心主任抨击马斯克削减DOGE是 "反科学 "行为
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的特别顾问削减美国科研预算作为其削减联邦开支努力的一部分之后，中国疾病预防控制中心前主任指责埃隆-马斯克损害了科学。【原文：The former head of China’s CDC has accused Elon Musk of hurting science after the special adviser to President Donald Trump cut the US budget for scientific research as part of his efforts to slash federal spending.】

item.title: 美国加大对华施压，习近平敦促官员保持冷静
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平敦促官员们在国内和全球挑战面前保持冷静，这表明中国政府将对特朗普政府新的贸易和投资限制措施采取审慎的态度。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping urged officials to stay composed amid domestic and global challenges, signaling Beijing will take a measured approach to the Trump administration’s new trade and investment restrictions.】

item.title: 韩国生育率多年来首次上升
item.description: 韩国的生育率出现了九年来的首次增长，这对于在世界上老龄化速度最快的社会之一加大育儿支持力度的政策制定者来说是一个难得的好消息。【原文：South Korea recorded the first increase in its fertility rate in nine years, in a rare piece of positive news for policymakers who have ramped up childcare support in one of the world’s fastest-aging societies.】

item.title: 美国东部港口码头工人工会批准六年期合同
item.description: 去年 10 月导致美国集装箱贸易半数停滞的码头工人工会已投票批准了与港口和海运公司雇主签订的新劳动合同。【原文：The dockworker union that brought half of US container trade to a halt last October has voted to ratify a new labor contract with their port and ocean carrier employers.】

item.title: 尽管存在法律风险，苹果仍将收入作为应用程序收费变更的优先考虑因素
item.description: 苹果公司的一位高管告诉法官，苹果公司决定向开发者收取 27% 的费用，以便将客户引导到 App Store 之外，即使这样做有可能违反法院命令，但对苹果公司底线的影响是其决定的关键部分。【原文：The impact on Apple Inc.’s bottom line was a key part of its decision to charge developers a 27% fee to steer customers outside the App Store, even if it risked defying a court order, a company executive told a judge.】

item.title: Adobe 发布 iPhone 版 Photoshop，安卓版稍后推出
item.description: Adobe 公司为 iPhone 发布了广受欢迎的 Photoshop 编辑应用程序，这是业界领先的创意软件在智能手机上的首次发布。【原文：Adobe Inc. released its popular Photoshop editing app for the iPhone, the first smartphone release of the industry-leading creative software.】

item.title: 韩国贸易部长将就关税问题会见路特尼克
item.description: 韩国最高贸易官员表示，他本周在华盛顿与商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克会面时，将寻求美国关税豁免。【原文：South Korea’s top trade official said he’ll seek an exemption from US tariffs when he meets with Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick in Washington this week.】

item.title: 破纪录上涨引发获利回吐后黄金边际上扬
item.description: 上一交易日，黄金价格下跌 1.3%，交易员们从最近一次创纪录的上涨中获利了结。【原文：Gold edged higher, after falling 1.3% in the previous session when traders booked profits from its latest record-breaking run.】

item.title: 顶级经济学家称中国需要 3 万亿美元的地方债务解决方案
item.description: 中国最著名的经济学家之一表示，中国需要加大力度清理全国地方政府的资产负债表，为它们提供支持消费支出和加强经济所需的空间。【原文：China needs to vastly step up its efforts to cleanse the balance sheets of the nation’s local governments, giving them the space needed to support consumer spending and strengthen the economy, one of the nation’s most prominent economists said.】

item.title: 澳新银行首席执行官称澳新银行交易调查是有史以来最复杂的调查之一
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管部门有望在今年年中结束对澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）债券交易活动的调查。【原文：Australia’s corporate watchdog is on track to conclude its investigation into bond trading activites at ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. by the middle of this year, a probe the watchdog’s chief said was among the toughest in its history.】

item.title: 澳大利亚月度通胀率保持稳定，住房涨幅放缓
item.description: 衡量澳大利亚总体通胀率的一项指标在 1 月份出人意料地保持稳定，这表明经济中的物价压力已得到遏制，并巩固了储备银行上周的降息决定。【原文：A gauge of Australian headline inflation surprisingly held steady in January, suggesting price pressures in the economy are contained and reinforcing the Reserve Bank’s decision to cut interest rates last week.】

item.title: 旅游业尚未重夺新西兰海外收入最高国家的桂冠
item.description: 新西兰旅游业要想重新成为新西兰最大的海外收入来源国，就必须进一步恢复。【原文：New Zealand’s tourist industry needs to recover further if it is to regain its crown as the nation’s biggest earner of overseas revenue.】

item.title: 中国必须削减 15%的钢铁产能才能实现 2025 年气候目标
item.description: 据清洁能源分析师称，如果钢厂要实现 2025 年的气候目标并恢复盈利，中国需要在今年削减 15%的产能，以解决钢铁过剩问题。【原文：China needs to tackle its steel glut by cutting 15% of capacity this year, if mills are to meet their 2025 climate goals and return to profitability, according to clean energy analysts.】

item.title: 英国电池制造商采用中国技术避免英伏特命运
item.description: 继 Britishvolt 有限公司倒闭之后，又一家初创公司开始在英国制造电池。不过，这家公司并不打算建立自己的内部技术，也不打算竞相建立一家巨型电池工厂。【原文：After the collapse of Britishvolt Ltd., another startup is having a go at making batteries in the UK. This one, though, doesn’t plan on building its own in-house technology or racing to build a giant battery factory.】

item.title: 分析师称孟加拉国新外汇规则将遏制塔卡损失
item.description: 据分析师称，孟加拉国银行的新货币战略可能有助于稳定今年的塔卡汇率，此前塔卡在2024年的表现不如大多数亚洲同行。【原文：Bangladesh Bank’s new currency strategy may help stabilize the taka this year, after it underperformed most Asian peers in 2024, according to analysts.】

item.title: 美国经济低迷，石油价格稳定在 60 美元左右
item.description: 由于经济前景恶化对能源需求前景构成威胁，并刺激投资者回避包括原油在内的风险资产，纽约油价在跌回每桶 60 美元区间后企稳。【原文：Oil in New York steadied after sinking back into the $60s-a-barrel range as a souring economic outlook threatened prospects for energy demand and spurred investors to shun risk assets including crude.】

item.title: 华侨银行在利润不佳的情况下推出 19 亿美元资本回报计划
item.description: 华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. ）宣布了一项 25 亿新元（19 亿美元）的资本返还计划，加入了新加坡竞争对手向投资者分配剩余资本的行列。【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. announced a S$2.5 billion ($1.9 billion) capital return program, joining its Singaporean rivals in distributing surplus capital to investors.】

item.title: 露营世界二手车销售强劲，业绩超出预期
item.description: 露营世界控股公司（Camping World Holdings Inc.【原文：Camping World Holdings Inc. revenue returned to growth after shrinking for more than two years with the recreational-vehicle dealer posting its strongest unit sales expansion in nearly four years.】

item.title: 英伟达为何是人工智能芯片之王？
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）曾一度成为全球最有价值的公司，但其股价暴涨的势头已经停滞。现在，投资者对向这家芯片制造商投入更多资金变得谨慎起来，因为人工智能计算的应用显然不会是一条坦途，也不会完全依赖 Nvidia 的技术。【原文：The blistering share rally that for a time made Nvidia Corp. the world’s most valuable company has stalled. Investors have become wary of pouring more money into the chipmaker now that it’s clear the adoption of artificial intelligence computing won’t be a straight path, and won’t rely solely on Nvidia technology.】

item.title: 美国贸易战袭来，香港预算应对赤字和增长放缓
item.description: 香港财政司司长陈茂波即将公布他的蓝图，以缩小香港的财政赤字，同时应对中国经济放缓和与美国贸易关系日益紧张所带来的不利因素。【原文：Hong Kong Financial Secretary Paul Chan is set to unveil his blueprint for shrinking the city’s deficit while countering headwinds from a slowing Chinese economy and rising trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: WiseTech 任命创始人理查德-怀特为执行主席
item.description: WiseTech Global Ltd.表示，该公司任命创始人兼最大股东理查德-怀特（Richard White）为执行董事长。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. said it appointed founder and largest shareholder Richard White as executive chairman.】

item.title: Circle 的 Allaire 称稳定币发行商应在美国注册
item.description: 稳定币发行商 Circle Internet Financial 的联合创始人杰里米-阿莱尔（Jeremy Allaire）提出，支撑数字资产市场大部分交易的美元加密货币的发行商应该在美国注册。【原文：Jeremy Allaire, the co-founder of stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Financial, is making the case that the issuers of the dollar-based cryptocurrencies that underpin much of the trading in digital-assets markets should be registered in the United States.】

item.title: 广播集团称联邦通信委员会应放弃限制合并的规定
item.description: 一个代表美国电视台和广播电台的主要行业组织呼吁联邦通信委员会放弃长期以来禁止合并的规定，因为这些规定阻碍了广播公司向全国范围的受众播出节目。【原文：A major trade group representing US TV and radio stations called for the Federal Communications Commission to drop longstanding rules against consolidation that prevent broadcasters from reaching nationwide audiences.】

item.title: 美国经济忧虑令股市下滑，债券反弹：市场综述
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数再次令人失望，加剧了人们对全球最大经济体健康状况的担忧。国债反弹推动 10 年期国债收益率跌至今年最低水平。【原文：Stocks in Asia are broadly set to follow a drop in the US, where another disappointing consumer confidence reading fueled concern about the health of the world’s largest economy. A rally in Treasuries drove 10-year yields to their lowest levels this year.】

item.title: 迄今为止，科技巨头已承诺在美国投资超过 1 万亿美元
item.description: 本周一，苹果公司成为最新一家承诺向美国投资数千亿美元的公司，唐纳德-特朗普总统对此表示赞赏。【原文：On Monday, Apple Inc. became the latest company to pledge hundreds of billions of dollars in US investments that President Donald Trump claimed credit for.】

item.title: 前大股东巴蒂斯塔称已为新企业融资 5 亿美元
item.description: 巴西大亨埃克-巴蒂斯塔（Eike Batista）曾一度是世界第八大富豪，后来倾家荡产，锒铛入狱。【原文：Eike Batista, the Brazilian tycoon who at one time was the world’s eighth-richest person before losing his fortune and serving time in jail, says he’s raised $500 million for a new venture to produce green jet fuel and food packaging.】

item.title: 超微公司迟交财务报告，缓解退市担忧
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. said it submitted outstanding financial reports to become compliant with Nasdaq Inc. rules, easing risks that the server maker will be delisted.】

item.title: 泰国央行预计将维持利率不变，但要求降息的呼声日益高涨
item.description: 人们普遍预计泰国央行将在周三维持其关键利率不变，但来自政府和包括国际货币基金组织在内的团体的压力与日俱增，要求进一步放宽政策以重振经济增长。【原文：The Bank of Thailand is widely expected to stand pat on its key interest rate on Wednesday, but there’s growing pressure from the government and groups including the International Monetary Fund for further easing to revive growth.】
